metadata.name: template_character
metadata.description:
[h1]About this mod[/h1] This is a mod for being a template to make your own character. Updated for Rept!
[h1]Notes[/h1] It is [b]highly suggested[/b] to grab the latest release of this character from its github [url=https://github.com/manaphoenix/IsaacTemplates]here[/url]
